item.title: Hugo Hosted on Nginx
item.description: Hugo is a powerful static website generator, which can be hosted on Nginx, Github, Gitlab. Here, I will share my experience of deploying a Hugo website with Nginx on the server. Hugo Command hugo new site websitename hugo builds your site hugo --buildDrafts/-Dinclude content marked as draft hugo server high performance server hugo server --buildDrafts/-D`include content marked as draft Ref: Hugo builds your site Nginx Installation Ref: Nginx安装与配置 Command cd /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx // ACC PATH .
